ygData.subject: Re: Freeport/Qeynos Faction Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I was told that there is a quest in qeynos where you deliver a message from someone in your guild to somone out in qeynos hills.  Then you can deliver a
ygData.messageBody:
I was told that there is a quest in qeynos where you deliver a message
from someone in your guild to somone out in qeynos hills. Then you can
deliver a message back to your guild. Each time it increases faction with
BOTH monk guilds. do this until you get no more faction adjusts
(approximatly 20) and then you can get the sash quests.

-dj

On Mon, 13 Sep 1999, Ezhar Montenegro wrote:

> From: "Ezhar Montenegro" <Ezhar@...>
>
> Brother Kaladiel,
>
> The acquisition of Sashes and Headbands boils down to, you guessed it, Religion. EQ, as in RL, is divided by not only Races and Classes, but also Religious affiliation. The Ashen Order is a religious group who heeds to the calling of Quellious. The Silent Fist on the other hand (no pun intended) is Agnostic, following no deity. This determines the alignment of factions for us Monks Brothers and Sisters.
>
> Repeated completion of the Silent Fist quests will build up your faction with the Ashen Order. If anyone knows of other ways to build faction, please post so that our Young Brothers and Sisters can achieve dual-quest status.
>
> Ezhar Montenegro
> Brother of the 28th Level, Ashen Order
> Proud Member of the Platinum Sphere Guild
> http://www.platinumsphere.com
>
>
> ---------- Original Message ----------------------------------
> From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> Reply-to: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Date: Mon, 13 Sep 1999 11:10:50 -0700
>
> >From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
> >
> >Yeah I know but it is still the pricipal behind it though, why should The
> >Freeport Monk be able to the Qeynos quests and the Qeynos monk not be able
> >to do the Freeport Quests.
> >
